mapper.select: SELECT * FROM likeList WHERE guestId=#{guestId} and roomId=#{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likeList (likeId, roomId, guestId) VALUES (likeListSeq.NEXTVAL, #{roomId}, #{guestId})
mapper.select: SELECT l.likeId, l.roomId, l.guestId , room.hostId, room.roomPrice, room.roomname, room.roomaddress, room.roomloc, room.roominfo, room.roomintro, room.roomclean, room.roompet, room.roomwprice, room.roomcap, room.roomtype, room.roomlat, room.roomlng, room.roomimage1, room.roomimage2, room.roomimage3, room.roomimage4, room.roomimage5, room.roomimage6, room.roomlikes, host.hostImage, host.hostName FROM likeList l JOIN room ON l.roomId = room.roomId JOIN host ON room.hostId = host.hostId WHERE l.guestId=#{guestId}
